W01_LTXT_COMM_CATHEDRAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_LTXT_COMM_CATHEDRAL_000_DETAIL.text: This building, erected by Imperial decree, contains a rock called Ama-no-Iwato that was once exposed to the elements. The building eventually came to be known by some by another name: the Cathedral.

W01_LTXT_COMM_GOKAKUDO_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_LTXT_COMM_GOKAKUDO_000_DETAIL.text: A historic building that has stood since the city's founding. The temple is at the center of the city's protections in accordance with the theory of the five elements. Due to its age, it's now a restricted area.

W01_LTXT_COMM_SEQUOIAMALL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_LTXT_COMM_SEQUOIAMALL_000_DETAIL.text: A large and popular shopping mall. Its name was considered a bit silly when the mall was first established, but people came to accept it after time.

W01_LTXT_COMM_MIYAKOTHEATRE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_LTXT_COMM_MIYAKOTHEATRE_000_DETAIL.text: Though this building is officially known as the Miyako Civic Theater, people just call it the Miyako Theater regardless. Visitors enjoy various forms of art here, from concerts to plays.

W01_LTXT_COMM_NORTHTEMPLE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_LTXT_COMM_NORTHTEMPLE_000_DETAIL.text: A historic building famous for its mountain location. The spring in its grounds is said to be a source of great natural energy.

W01_LTXT_COMM_SOUTHTEMPLE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_LTXT_COMM_SOUTHTEMPLE_000_DETAIL.text: This tower is a major landmark in Miyako City. Despite looking like it has five stories from the outside, it actually contains only four.

W01_LTXT_COMM_JIZOPARK_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_LTXT_COMM_JIZOPARK_000_DETAIL.text: A park popular with local elementary school children. A Jizo statue stands watch in one corner.

W01_LTXT_COMM_GHOSTTOWN_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_LTXT_COMM_GHOSTTOWN_000_DETAIL.text: This ancient village is now surrounded by woodlands. The idea of using it as a draw for tourists is currently under consideration, but for now, the city has forbidden anyone to go inside.

W01_LTXT_COMM_LIMESTONECAVE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_LTXT_COMM_LIMESTONECAVE_000_DETAIL.text: The city restricted access to this cave after someone went missing in its depths.

W01_LTXT_COMM_HOTEL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_LTXT_COMM_HOTEL_000_DETAIL.text: A luxury hotel built on sought-after land away from the bustle and noise of Miyako City.

W01_LTXT_COMM_RAKUHOKUSTA_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_LTXT_COMM_RAKUHOKUSTA_010_DETAIL.text: A train station in Miyako. The trains aren't running right now.

W01_LTXT_COMM_RAKUTOSTA_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_LTXT_COMM_RAKUTOSTA_010_DETAIL.text: A train station in Miyako. The trains aren't running right now.

W01_LTXT_COMM_RAKUNANSTA_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_LTXT_COMM_RAKUNANSTA_010_DETAIL.text: A Miyako Rail station. The trains aren't running right now.

W01_LTXT_COMM_MIYAKOUNIV_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_LTXT_COMM_MIYAKOUNIV_000_DETAIL.text: One of the two most famous universities in the entire country. Many of its students go on to receive international recognition.

W01_LTXT_COMM_RAKUGAKU_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_LTXT_COMM_RAKUGAKU_000_DETAIL.text: A combined middle and high school for young women. There are no rumors about it becoming a mixed school to combat declining birth rates.

W01_LTXT_COMM_HOUSEOFMIDO_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_LTXT_COMM_HOUSEOFMIDO_000_DETAIL.text: The main building with its elegant exterior, built before the war, is quite famous. Sadly, since the house is still used as a residence, it's not possible to tour it. Rumors claim a large dog also lives here.

W01_LTXT_COMM_HOUSEOFIZUMI_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_LTXT_COMM_HOUSEOFIZUMI_000_DETAIL.text: Your home while living as Yumeha Izumi. Though not as luxurious as Leone Bianco Palazzo in Pulchra, it's still quite comfortable.

W01_LTXT_COMM_KATSURAKITAES_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_LTXT_COMM_KATSURAKITAES_000_DETAIL.text: A municipal elementary school in Miyako City. You hear the cheerful sound of children's voices inside.

W01_LTXT_COMM_RAKUHOKUSTA_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
W01_LTXT_COMM_RAKUHOKUSTA_000_TITLE.text: Take the Train from Rakuhoku Station

W01_LTXT_COMM_RAKUHOKUSTA_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_LTXT_COMM_RAKUHOKUSTA_000_DETAIL.text: This is the closest station to Miyako Imperial University. You can travel to Rakuto Station and Rakunan Station from here.

W01_LTXT_COMM_RAKUTOSTA_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
W01_LTXT_COMM_RAKUTOSTA_000_TITLE.text: Take the Train from Rakuto Station

W01_LTXT_COMM_RAKUTOSTA_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_LTXT_COMM_RAKUTOSTA_000_DETAIL.text: This is the closest station to Sequoia Mall. You can travel to Rakuhoku Station and Rakunan Station from here.

W01_LTXT_COMM_RAKUNANSTA_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
W01_LTXT_COMM_RAKUNANSTA_000_TITLE.text: Take the Train from Rakunan Station

W01_LTXT_COMM_RAKUNANSTA_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_LTXT_COMM_RAKUNANSTA_000_DETAIL.text: This is the closest station to Keihoku Elementary School. You can travel to Rakuhoku Station and Rakuto Station from here.

W01_WRLD_COMM_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_WRLD_COMM_000_DETAIL.text: After passing through the stone gate, you find yourself in a strange urban environment made from a mix of old and new.

W01_EVAR_COMM_CATHEDRAL_DOOR_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_CATHEDRAL_DOOR_000_DETAIL.text: The strange stone gate you used to enter this world. You can likely leave it in the same way.

W01_EVAR_COMM_MEETING_TSUNA_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_MEETING_TSUNA_000_TITLE.text: Meeting in Front of the Station

W01_EVAR_COMM_MEETING_TSUNA_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_MEETING_TSUNA_000_DETAIL.text: You haven't a clue where you are. Perhaps gathering information in a place with lots of people would be a good start.

W01_EVAR_COMM_MEETING_TSUNA_000_BUTTON.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_MEETING_TSUNA_000_BUTTON.text: Go to the Area in Front of the Station

W01_EVAR_COMM_SANGENIN_SPRING_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_SANGENIN_SPRING_000_DETAIL.text: This temple was built on a slope in the mountains. The flow of water in the nearby falls appears to have stopped. What could have happened here?

W01_EVAR_COMM_SANGENIN_SPRING_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_SANGENIN_SPRING_010_DETAIL.text: This temple was built on a slope in the mountains. The flow of water in the nearby falls appears to have stopped. What could have happened here?

W01_EVAR_COMM_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_DETAIL.text: This temple was built on a slope in the mountains. You saw the man you're after enter the cave where the waterfalls begin. You should go after him.

W01_EVAR_COMM_SANGENIN_FALL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_SANGENIN_FALL_000_DETAIL.text: This waterfall flows from a spring deep in the grounds of Sangen-in Temple, and is said to bring great blessings.

W01_EVAR_COMM_SANGENIN_FALL_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_SANGENIN_FALL_010_DETAIL.text: This waterfall flows from a spring deep in the grounds of Sangen-in Temple, and is said to grant long life.

W01_EVAR_COMM_SANGENIN_FALL_020_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_SANGENIN_FALL_020_DETAIL.text: This waterfall flows from a spring deep in the grounds of Sangen-in Temple, and is said to bring great blessings.

W01_EVAR_COMM_CURSED_MIRROR_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_CURSED_MIRROR_000_DETAIL.text: You arrived at Sequoia Mall in your pursuit of the mysterious man. Will anyone here have information that can help you?

W01_EVAR_COMM_CURSED_MIRROR_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_CURSED_MIRROR_010_DETAIL.text: This is a broken mirror you found in Sequoia Mall. Will you be able to repair it this time?

W01_EVAR_COMM_CURSED_MIRROR_020_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_CURSED_MIRROR_020_DETAIL.text: You arrived at Sequoia Mall in your pursuit of the mysterious man. Will anyone inside have information that can help you?

W01_EVAR_COMM_CURSED_MIRROR_030_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_CURSED_MIRROR_030_DETAIL.text: This is a broken mirror you found in Sequoia Mall. Will you be able to repair it this time?

W01_EVAR_COMM_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_DETAIL.text: You arrived on the roof of Sequoia Mall in your pursuit of the mysterious man. It's time to search for him and the small shrine.

W01_EVAR_COMM_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_010_DETAIL.text: You arrived on the roof of Sequoia Mall in your pursuit of the mysterious man. It's time to search for him and the small shrine.

W01_EVAR_COMM_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_DETAIL.text: You found the mysterious man on the roof of Sequoia Mall.

W01_EVAR_COMM_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_FAILED_000_.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_FAILED_000_.text: You found a talisman in the shrine on the roof of Sequoia Mall. Hopefully you'll be able to repair it this time.

W01_EVAR_COMM_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_FAILED_010_.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_FAILED_010_.text: You found a talisman in the shrine on the roof of Sequoia Mall. Hopefully you'll be able to repair it this time.

W01_EVAR_COMM_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_DETAIL.text: You hear the sound of dripping water within this cave.

W01_EVAR_COMM_PRIMA_DONNA_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_PRIMA_DONNA_000_DETAIL.text: The receptionist in the theater seems to have something on her mind.

W01_EVAR_COMM_DANGEROUS_FLOG_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_DANGEROUS_FLOG_000_DETAIL.text: An oddly dressed man is standing by the lake. There seems to be a problem here.

W01_EVAR_COMM_DANGEROUS_FLOG_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_DANGEROUS_FLOG_010_DETAIL.text: An oddly dressed man is standing by the lake. There seems to be a problem here.

W01_EVAR_COMM_DANGEROUS_FLOG_020_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_DANGEROUS_FLOG_020_DETAIL.text: An oddly dressed man is standing by the lake. There seems to be a problem here.

W01_EVAR_COMM_GOTO_SOUTH_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_GOTO_SOUTH_000_DETAIL.text: Rakuto Station, the place where you first met Tsunanori, is apparently a place where one can find vehicles called 'trains.'

W01_EVAR_COMM_PAGODA_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_PAGODA_000_DETAIL.text: A four-floored, five-story tower. You should investigate the strange sounds you heard coming from the top floor.

W01_EVAR_COMM_PAGODA_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_PAGODA_010_DETAIL.text: A four-floored, five-story tower. You should investigate the strange sounds you heard coming from the top floor.

W01_EVAR_COMM_PAGODA_010_BUTTON.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_PAGODA_010_BUTTON.text: Go to the Tower's Fifth Floor

W01_EVAR_COMM_PAGODA_020_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_PAGODA_020_DETAIL.text: A four-floored, five-story tower. You sense that man here.

W01_EVAR_COMM_PAGODA_FAILED_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_PAGODA_FAILED_000_DETAIL.text: The magatama in Rakusuiro—the four-floored, five-story tower—has broken. You should repair it to restore power to the barrier.

W01_EVAR_COMM_PAGODA_FAILED_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_PAGODA_FAILED_010_DETAIL.text: The magatama in Rakusuiro—the four-floored, five-story tower—has broken. You should repair it to restore power to the barrier.

W01_EVAR_COMM_JIZO_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_JIZO_000_DETAIL.text: Apparently one of the barrier's knots is in Komainu Jizo Children's Park. You should try to find it.

W01_EVAR_COMM_JIZO_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_JIZO_010_DETAIL.text: You see the mysterious man in Komainu Jizo Children's Park. What is he doing here?

W01_EVAR_COMM_MIYAKOUNIV_INFO_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_MIYAKOUNIV_INFO_000_DETAIL.text: This is the university that Tsunanori attends. Did anyone here see a shining object fly by?

W01_EVAR_COMM_MIYAKOUNIV_INFO_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_MIYAKOUNIV_INFO_010_DETAIL.text: This is the university that Tsunanori attends. Did anyone here see a shining object fly by?

W01_EVAR_COMM_MOVINGTREE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_MOVINGTREE_000_DETAIL.text: The abandoned village where the moving tree was supposedly seen. You should go inside and ensure the safety of the student who came here to investigate it.

W01_EVAR_COMM_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_DETAIL.text: Did anyone at Keihoku Elementary School see a shining object fly by?

W01_EVAR_COMM_HANIWA_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_HANIWA_000_DETAIL.text: Did anyone in Rakugaku—the school Tsunanori's younger sister attends—see a shining object fly by?

W01_EVAR_COMM_HOTEL_INFO_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_HOTEL_INFO_000_DETAIL.text: Tourists frequent this hotel. You think someone here might have seen a shining object fly by.

W01_EVAR_COMM_HOTEL_INFO_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_HOTEL_INFO_010_DETAIL.text: Tourists frequent this hotel. You think someone here might have seen a shining object fly by.

W01_EVAR_COMM_GHOST_BIKE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_GHOST_BIKE_000_DETAIL.text: You should ask the vendor if she saw the shining object that supposedly flew off toward Rakuhoku Station.

W01_EVAR_COMM_GHOST_BIKE_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_GHOST_BIKE_010_DETAIL.text: Supposedly Ume's sister ran off in pursuit of the shining object. Where could she be now?

W01_EVAR_COMM_GHOST_BIKE_020_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_GHOST_BIKE_020_DETAIL.text: Supposedly the eldest of the three sisters ran off in pursuit of the shining object. Could this be her?

W01_EVAR_COMM_GHOST_BIKE_030_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_GHOST_BIKE_030_DETAIL.text: A motorcycle has been abandoned at the side of the road. Could this be the one you heard about?

W01_EVAR_COMM_KOMAINU_JIZO_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_KOMAINU_JIZO_000_DETAIL.text: You now have all five colored tiles. You should use them to restore the barrier's power.

W01_EVAR_COMM_KOMAINU_JIZO_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_KOMAINU_JIZO_010_DETAIL.text: You made a mistake while putting the jizo's design back together. Try again.

W01_EVAR_COMM_CONSPIRACY_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_CONSPIRACY_000_DETAIL.text: That man is apparently on his way to Gokakudo Temple, the center of Miyako City's barrier. What is he planning?

W01_EVAR_COMM_CONSPIRACY_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_CONSPIRACY_010_DETAIL.text: That man is apparently on his way to Gokakudo Temple, the center of Miyako City's barrier. What is he planning?

W01_EVAR_COMM_CONSPIRACY_020_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_CONSPIRACY_020_DETAIL.text: That man is apparently on his way to Gokakudo Temple, the center of Miyako City's barrier. What is he planning?

W01_EVAR_COMM_AMANO_IWATO_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_AMANO_IWATO_000_DETAIL.text: You foiled that man's schemes. Perhaps it's now time to leave this world.

W01_EVAR_COMM_AMANO_IWATO_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_AMANO_IWATO_010_DETAIL.text: That man might be attempting to leave this world via Ama-no-Iwato. You should investigate.

W01_EVAR_COMM_AMANO_IWATO_020_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_AMANO_IWATO_020_DETAIL.text: You have done what you set out to do in this world. The time has come to leave.

W01_EVAR_COMM_AMANO_IWATO_030_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_AMANO_IWATO_030_DETAIL.text: There is nothing else you need to do in this world right now. If you pass through Ama-no-Iwato in the shrine, you can leave.

W01_EVAR_COMM_POWER_SPOT_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_POWER_SPOT_000_DETAIL.text: You wonder what happened to the five-story tower. You should go take a look.

W01_EVAR_COMM_POWER_SPOT_000_BUTTON.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_POWER_SPOT_000_BUTTON.text: Enter the Grounds of Rakusuiro Tower

W01_EVAR_COMM_MIYAKO_REPORT_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_MIYAKO_REPORT_000_DETAIL.text: You witnessed the otherworldly man making for the hotel. You can only hope he's not going to cause more trouble there...

W01_EVAR_COMM_MIYAKO_REPORT_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_MIYAKO_REPORT_010_DETAIL.text: You witnessed the otherworldly man making for the hotel. You can only hope he's not going to cause more trouble there...

W01_EVAR_COMM_DISTURBING_CAVE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_DISTURBING_CAVE_000_DETAIL.text: You hear the sound of dripping water within this limestone cave.

W01_EVAR_COMM_MIYAKOTHEATRE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_MIYAKOTHEATRE_000_DETAIL.text: Every so often, you hear music coming from this large building. What could it be?

W01_EVAR_COMM_MIYAKO_TRAIN_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_MIYAKO_TRAIN_000_DETAIL.text: This vehicle travels on tracks. Perhaps you should try riding it since you're here?

W01_EVAR_COMM_TURINST_HOTEL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_TURINST_HOTEL_000_DETAIL.text: People are going in and out of this location carrying large bags—there even seems to be families traveling together. Perhaps it's some form of lodging?

W01_EVAR_COMM_EREMENTARY_SCHOOL_000_DETA.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_EREMENTARY_SCHOOL_000_DETA.text: Children are cavorting in this vast facility, but it seems like more than a simple playground. What else could it be used for?

W01_EVAR_COMM_GIRLS_SCHOOLLIFE_000_DETAI.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_GIRLS_SCHOOLLIFE_000_DETAI.text: There don't seem to be any men in this place, and everyone is wearing the same clothes. What is this?

W01_EVAR_COMM_STAFF_AND_CAT_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_STAFF_AND_CAT_000_TITLE.text: The Female Receptionist and the Cat

W01_EVAR_COMM_STAFF_AND_CAT_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_STAFF_AND_CAT_000_DETAIL.text: The receptionist at the front of the Miyako theater is having a heartwarming battle with her cat.

W01_EVAR_COMM_STAFF_AND_CAT_000_BUTTON.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_STAFF_AND_CAT_000_BUTTON.text: Call to the Woman at Reception

W01_EVAR_COMM_HARD_TO_DECIDING_000_DETAI.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_HARD_TO_DECIDING_000_DETAI.text: You should inform the employee who told you about the motorcycle that you found it on the highway.

W01_EVAR_COMM_FATHER_THOUGHT_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_FATHER_THOUGHT_000_DETAIL.text: You picked something up in Sangen-in Temple. Apparently the man in front of you dropped it.

W01_EVAR_COMM_GHOSTTOWN_BATTLE_000_DETAI.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_GHOSTTOWN_BATTLE_000_DETAI.text: A village that was destroyed in a disaster long ago. The sadness, fear, and other negative emotions created at that time still linger in this place.

W01_EVAR_COMM_CAVE_BATTLE_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_CAVE_BATTLE_000_TITLE.text: Phantom Extermination in the Limestone Cave

W01_EVAR_COMM_CAVE_BATTLE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_CAVE_BATTLE_000_DETAIL.text: Fiends have taken up residence in this limestone cave. If you go inside, you should be ready to face great danger.

W01_EVAR_COMM_OOIKE_BATTLE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_OOIKE_BATTLE_000_DETAIL.text: A strange creature has been sighted at the great lake in the southern part of Miyako City.

W01_EVAR_COMM_BRIDGE_BATTLE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_COMM_BRIDGE_BATTLE_000_DETAIL.text: There are rumors of a terrifying shadow being sighted. What could it be?
